overview:
Mike Miles is Chief Technology Officer at Earth Class Mail and he leads the robotics and automation team.

For the prior 16 years before co-founding Earth Class Mail, Mike was a principal of ME-Tech, LLC, a mechanical design engineering consulting firm. Among his extensive roster of clients are Apple Computer, nCube, E.Com, Eclipse Technologies, Fiber Sensys, InFocus Systems, Instromedix, Integrated Measurement Systems (IMS), Intel, Lightware, Sentrol, Planar Systems, Sarif, Warn Industries, Tektronix, and ZIBA.

Prior to founding the firm in 1988, Mike spent eight years as a Mechanical/Electromechanical Project Engineer designing components and systems for Tektronix and, later, AT&E Systems (Seiko Receptor Watch). Mike holds eight issued patents, and is a registered Professional Engineer, and a member of ASME, SAE and National Assembly of Professional Engineers.

Mike studied Liberal Arts, Computer Science, and Physics at Willamette University, and received his B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from Oregon State University.

Source: Earth Class Mail
